moves.13... Nxg3:
now white has some choices to make, lets count to see the alternatives:
a) Bxd7 loses the rook to Nxh1 but the Zwischenzug Nd3+ forks the king and bishop to win yet another piece a forced sequence after 14.Bxd7?? Nd3+ 15.Kd1 only move 15...Nxb2+ 16.K moves Nxh1 as the b2 knight is temporarily protected by the threat Bxd4 to skewer the rook
